meta.name: description
meta.content: Athlos Leadership Academy, a charter school in Brooklyn Park, MN, prepares students for a competitive future through Academic, Athletic and Character curriculum

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Athlos Leadership Academy, Athlos, Athlos Brooklyn Park, Athlos Academy MN, charter school, Minnesota, K-9 school, public school, Brooklyn Park schools

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 400px;
color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1000px; height: auto
div.p: Athlos Leadership Academy has been awarded the 2018 Readers Choice Award for Best Public School by the Brooklyn Park Sun Post.

div.marquee: Now accepting applications for the 2019-2020 and 2020-2021 school year. Please see the 'Apply Today' page for more information.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 290px; height: 107px;

div.div:
What skills do students need to succeed? Research shows there's more to it than academics.
Athlos is a unique public school model that prepares kids for a competitive future in three essential ways: Academics + Fitness + Character. In fact, the principles and skills taught at Athlos are a better indicator for lifelong success than GPA alone.
Learn how The Athlos Difference is preparing students to excel in school, in college, and in life.

section.p: Our Pre-Kindergarten program is a Parent Aware 4-Star Rated program.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 290px; height: 107px;

section.p: See the attached parent letter from Principal Geraghty.

Good Evening Athlos Families,
We will be hosting a food distribution tomorrow, Monday April 13 and Tuesday, April 14 from 11:00am - 1:30 pm. Please come to the drive in lane at the front of the building.
I look forward to seeing you tomorrow. Please let me know if you need anything I will be on campus all week.
Warmly,
Principal Geraghty

Dear Athlos Families,
In order to accommodate families with more than one student in our school, we have staggered the morning meeting/advisory times for the grade levels. We did this to give the opportunity to more students to be able to attend morning meeting/advisory with their class. Please see the updated morning meeting/advisory time for your student’s grade level in their teacher’s Wednesday morning post.
Warmly,
Principal Geraghty
See the attached parent letter from Principal Geraghty.

div.p: Volunteers of America is our Authorizer. 924 - 19th Avenue South, Minneapolis, MN 55404, 612-375-0700.

In accordance with Federal law and U.S. Department of Agriculture policy, this school is prohibited from discrimination on the basis of race, color,national origin, sex, age, or disability. To file a complaint of discrimination, write USDA, Director, Office of Civil Rights, 1400 Independence Avenue, SW, Washington, D.C. 20250-9410 or call (800) 795-3272 or (202) 720-6382 (TTY). USDA is an equal opportunity provider and employer.
